Package ohos.aafwk.ability.delegation

Class AbilityDelegatorRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.aafwk.ability.delegation.AbilityDelegatorRegistry

  • public final class AbilityDelegatorRegistry
extends Object
    A global register used to store the IAbilityDelegator and IAbilityDelegatorArgs objects registered during application startup.

    The application registers the IAbilityDelegator and IAbilityDelegatorArgs objects when parsing TestRunner parameters. When writing test cases, you can use this class to obtain the IAbilityDelegator and IAbilityDelegatorArgs objects of your own application. IAbilityDelegator can be used to control the lifecycle states of abilities; and IAbilityDelegatorArgs is used to store all parameters for unit testing.

    Since:
    3
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Aafwk#ABILITY

    • Method Detail

      • getAbilityDelegator

        public static IAbilityDelegator getAbilityDelegator​()
        Obtains the IAbilityDelegator object of the application.
        Returns:
        Returns the IAbilityDelegator object initialized when the application is started.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - Throws this exception if the application does not need to run unit tests.
        Since:
        3

      • getArguments

        public static IAbilityDelegatorArgs getArguments​()
        Obtains unit test parameters stored in the IAbilityDelegatorArgs object.
        Returns:
        Returns the previously registered IAbilityDelegatorArgs object.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - Throws this exception if the application does not need to run unit tests.
        Since:
        3

      • registerInstance

        public static void registerInstance​(IAbilityDelegator delegator,
                                    IAbilityDelegatorArgs args)
        Registers the instances of classes implementing IAbilityDelegator and IAbilityDelegatorArgs as globally unique instances.

        This method is called during application startup to initialize the test environment.

        Parameters:
        delegator - Indicates the instance of the class implementing IAbilityDelegator.
        args - Indicates the instance of the class implementing IAbilityDelegatorArgs.
        Since:
        3
